Description of incident: John Muir Health, the Walnut Creek-based hospital system, has begun notifying 5,450 patients by mail of a potential breach of their personal and health information. Two months ago two laptop computers at the John Muir Physician Network Perinatal office in Walnut Creek were stolen. The laptops were password protected and contained data in a format that would not be readily accessible. External vendors and internal experts discovered that the missing laptops contained personal and health information going back more than three years.
